{"jdbcDatasource":"default","query":"UPDATE shkprocessdata pd
INNER JOIN shkprocesses p
 ON pd.Process = p.oid 
 SET pd.VariableValueVCHAR='#variable.sub_estado_filtro#' 
 WHERE p.Id = '#variable.id_processo_pai#';"}
